name: R&D paid for by the company and others and performed by the company outside of the United States, by selected location: 2021
description: R&D paid for by the company and others and performed by the company outside of the United States, by selected location: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Country detail was not collected from companies reporting less than $1 million of R&D paid for by the company or reporting less than $1 million of R&D paid for by others. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded $50,000 or more of R&D and are not comparable with estimates published for years prior to 2018.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey, 2021.
